com.sun.tools.javac.v8.util
类 ListBuffer

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.tools.javac.v8.util.ListBuffer
直接已知子类：
Todo
public class ListBuffer
extends java.lang.Object

A class for constructing lists by appending elements. Modelled after java.lang.StringBuffer.

字段摘要
 int count
          The number of element in this buffer.
 List elems
          The list of elements of this buffer.
 List last
          A pointer pointing to the last, sentinel element of `elems'.
 boolean shared
          Has a list been created from this buffer yet?
 
构造方法摘要
ListBuffer()
          Create a new initially empty list buffer.
 
方法摘要
 ListBuffer append(java.lang.Object x)
          Append an element to buffer.
 ListBuffer appendArray(java.lang.Object[] xs)
          Append all elements in an array to buffer.
 ListBuffer appendList(List xs)
          Append all elements in a list to buffer.
 boolean contains(java.lang.Object x)
          Does the list contain the specified element?
 Enumeration elements()
          An enumeration of all elements in this buffer.
 java.lang.Object first()
          The first element in this buffer.
 boolean isEmpty()
          Is buffer empty?
 int length()
          Return the number of elements in this buffer.
 java.lang.Object next()
          Return first element in this buffer and remove
 boolean nonEmpty()
          Is buffer not empty?
 ListBuffer prepend(java.lang.Object x)
          Prepend an element to buffer.
 void remove()
          Remove the first element in this buffer.
 java.lang.Object[] toArray(java.lang.Object[] vec)
          Convert buffer to an array
 List toList()
          Convert buffer to a list of all its elements.
